name: Airship Journey
description:
This game was made in less than 15 hours

Airship combat. You are alone against 6 steampunk airship pirates.

The idea was to create a story with more levels and variations, but this was my first Ludum Dare and I didn't had time to implement it all.

Features: Cannon balls, explosions, airships and steampunk music.

Attention: There is a bug when you die while in cannon view. I'm really sorry for that, couldn't fix it in time =/

View it on Ludum Dare
